title: Winner of the TomTom NEXT Hackathon - Challenge 3 in Master Level
description: Worked with two other Codam students to build a solution for truck drivers' safety and efficiency during rest periods.
highlights: Built route optimization that considers mandatory rest periods
Created a desktop interface for delivery planning
Used QR codes to sync delivery data to trucks
Made a driver app that generates routes from QR scans
Solved real logistics problems with code

title: Winner of the Instagram Content Creator Bonus Prize
description: Made the best Instagram reel during the TomTom NEXT Hackathon.
highlights: Created engaging content about our hackathon project
Used social media to tell our technical story

title: 2nd Place Winner of the WE.VESTR x Codam Hackathon
description: Came in second at a 36-hour hackathon, tackling challenges about making software more engaging and improving financial projections for startups.
highlights: Built a drag-and-drop interface for custom metrics
Made financial reporting easier for meetings
Extended user engagement with analytics tools
Focused on solving real business problems
